Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1965...
Released by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 3/2/1965 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1967, off Bob Gibson (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1967, off Bob Sadowski (STL)...
Injured on 5/21/1969 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/18/1969 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/21/1970 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis on 6/20/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/24/1973, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/13/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/15/1973, hitting .571 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1973, hitting .388 with 8 HR, 27 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/27/1976...
Injured on 5/18/1976 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 7/7/1977...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1978, hitting .370 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
